name: 撞击公主 ! / Princess Hit !
description:
【 Gameplay 】


This is a simple puzzle game, catapult princess hit monsters, and beat them.
Defeat a monster on completion and you will be given an improved princess fetter.
Raising the bonds not only greatly enhances the growth of princesses, but also deepens the understanding with princesses.

【 Game story 】


The world after the demon king is defeated, although there are still some demons on the mainland, but the peace of the world has been maintained for many years, the princesses want to go to the beautiful world outside to have a look, they pulled up the brave rushed out of the king city.
The princess in order to experience their own, let the brave raiding array alone on the crusade against the devil, continuous experience and training to promote the feelings between the princess and the brave.





【The game features】


■ super easy play.
■ over 20 exquisite CG photos.
■ more professional characteristics of princesses.
